item.title: MongoDBç¬”è®°
item.description: I. install mongodb # docker docker pull mongo:4 # install mongodb 4 docker images # show images docker run --name mymongo -v /usr/local/var/docker/mongodb/data:/data/db -d mongo:4 docker ps docker logs mymongo # install mongo express docker pull mongo-express docker run --link mymongo:mongo -p 8081:8081 mongo-express # mac brew install mongodb-community brew services start mongodb/brew/mongodb-community # 1.1 init mongodb set auth for mongodb You can login mongodb direct without password when your mongodb version grate or enquit v4.
